pages.title: Pristine Armor
pages.text: Using the Pristine Essence you manage to craft te most powerful armor.$(br)The purity of te Pristine Essence even allows the Armor to be dyed, so be creative!

pages.title: Pristine Essence Helmet
pages.text: The wearer can $(l)breathe underwater$() for an unlimited amount of time.

pages.title: Pristine Essence Chestplate
pages.text: Additionally grants the wearer $(l)Regeneration$() and $(l)Fire Protection$().$(br)$(br)Equipping the full Pristine Armor set allows the player to $(l)fly$() for an unlimited amount of time.

pages.title: Pristine Essence Leggings
pages.text: Constantly gives the wearer $(l)SPEED II$() and $(l)SPEED III while sprinting$().
